title: FS: Illustrated History of Baseball Cards
author: drumback

posts.post_title: FS: Illustrated History of Baseball Cards
posts.post_content:
David Rudd's Illustrated History of Baseball Cards for sale.  Includes volume I: The 1800's, and volume II: 1900 to 1915.  Both in excellent condition.

Sorry, for some reason I can't get the scans to download.  Volume I has a Hess and Co. card of Lawton on the cover.  Volume II has the T3 card of Walter Johnson on the cover.

SOLD

Mark
[url]drumback2@cox.net[/url]
